author: Geographical Staff
title: Better World: Child soldiers rescued
text:
Youngsters dragged into the civil war in Burkina Faso are regaining their childhood in a secret care centre
A brutal civil war has left many victims in Burkina Faso, many of them children drawn into the conflict as soldiers, sex slaves, and camp workers. This video, entered into the MPB Geographical Better World Video Awards, tells the story of two youngsters rescued and rebuilding their lives in a secret care centre. We published a
 full report on the Plan International centre in our August 2023 edition.
If you have a great story to tell about how we can make the world a better place, please enter your video.
